pre_caption: This is a high-angle wide shot of an animated scene. In the foreground, two figures stand on a cloud formation, initially positioned in the center-right of the frame, with additional clouds occupying the bottom right. The background is dominated by a luminous, canyon-like chasm in the center, which contains a multitude of smaller figures on a path receding into the depth of the scene. As the camera slowly moves to the right, the foreground figures and clouds shift across the frame toward the right edge, while the central chasm in the background remains the focal point.
